channel.title: How to make a box when clicked give you items ONLY ONCE!
channel.description:
The title pretty much says it all. I want to make a mod, admin and an owner box which each give you different things like. Mod gives you h'ween masks, admin gives you phats and owner gives you santa hats now i want it so mod can only get mod box stuff then admin can only get admin box and mod box stuff and owner can get everything but i want them all to only each be able to give you items once understand? Please help me i'm am only a beginner coder.
I am using allstar scape server source and it is a 317. Thanks for your time :D

item.title: How to make a box when clicked give you items ONLY ONCE!
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Call the addItem(arg1, arg2); method in your object clicking case.

Read full topic
